channel.title: Route on Notatki
channel.description: Recent content in Route on Notatki

item.title: MacOS: adding custom route for VPN network
item.description: Overview After connecting via Tunnelblick to OpenVPN server when you do not have connection to some part of the network, that you know is reachable, you can add route to that subnet manually on the client. Identify VPN gateway Show routing table with numerical addresses only to get Gateway IPv4 address for utun1 VPN interfaces. netstat -rn Routing tables Internet: Destination Gateway Flags Refs Use Netif Expire 0/1 10.
